When using dnd_sections, is there a way to change the options given to the editor? For example I don't want them to be able to adjust the padding and margin on a section and I'd like to give them a few options for the background style, rather than giving them total freedom.
At the moment, no, there is no way to lock down styles of dnd_sections / columns / rows.
